alert.note: Alert for Orange; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 2:17PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Orange and northwestern Osceola Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 216 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Orlando to near Buena Ventura Lakes to Campbell. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Kissimmee, Saint Cloud, Wedgefield, and Buena Ventura Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
